name: Public Citizens for Children and Youth
organization: Public Citizens for Children and Youth
description:
PCCY strives to improve the lives and life chances of our region's children through thoughtful and informed advocacy. Work spans child health, early learning, education, and family stability. An example of work that's been done in partnership with Haverford College is a project in which a group of students worked with PCCY to make progress on the Dream Care campaign to fight for health insurance for PA children who are undocumented and do not have insurance.

https://www.pccy.org/
